channel.title: Random rollback
channel.description: I was working on setting up my experience grinder when I got disconnected. When I logged back in I didn't noticed anything, all my recent edits were there. But when I went back to my item collection point half of it was rolled-back even the chest contents. Checking hawk tool shows that I did indeed clear the area out. Not sure what happen but figured you guys should know of this strange phenomenon. It seems to have been contained to a small area.

item.title: Random rollback
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ok, well let me know if it happens again.

Read full topic

item.title: Random rollback
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Which world and which area? I’ll have a look at it tommorow.


This is where it is happening. You can get there from the ladder inside my cathedral. The corridor I am looking at gets rolled back to stone all the way up to where the water transports the items.

Edit: It happen again, it always rolls back the same area and the 2 chest there get their items reverted.

Read full topic
